summary.span: 表示 类的实例的集合。

This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个集合中表示的扩展性元素添加到，并指定相应的 MIME 类型。Each within the collection represents an extensibility element added to a , and specifies the MIME type for a corresponding . 有关指定的 XML Web 服务协议的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性和方法公开的`MimePartCollection`类。The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `MimePartCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的项的数目等于集合的容量，则容量被加倍通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`参数等于、`mimePart`参数添加到末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `mimePart` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的一个典型用途`Insert`方法。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Insert` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟在移除的元素`MimePart`将上移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed `MimePart` move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的一个典型用途`Remove`方法。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Remove` method.
